creator: Reliable.Services
descriptionHtml:
Brilliant Public School is a K-12 offering Bio/Maths/Commerce streams at the Sr. Sec level. School is affiliated to CBSE, Delhi (Aff. No.3330074).

BPS is an English Medium Co-ed School, a school with a difference, sprawling in a 6.87 acres campus, with fully air-conditioned infrastructure. It adorns your child with life skills to be a future leader.The school has been awarded an International School Award by the British Council for the year 2015-2018 . We also have Pasteur's Lab, Aryabhatta’s Lab, Dalton’s Lab, Advanced Computer Lab “Bytes” with internet facility, Da-Vinci’s Art and Craft Room, Multimedia Room, Classes with Projectors and Big Screens and Library Room with more than 16000 books and CDs. We assure safety and strict monitoring through cameras all over. For transport facility, we have a fleet of 72 Vans and 17 Buses.

Special assemblies are organized to impart knowledge for occasions like World Health Day, Ram Navami, Baisakhi, Ambedkar Jayanti, Good Friday, Bio Diversity, Van Mahotsav, World Population Day, Raksha Bandhan, Janmashtami, National Sports Day, Ramzan ,Ganesh Chaturthi, Teacher’s Day, World Literacy Day, World Ozone Day, Gandhi Jayanti and Dussehra, Deepawali, C.G. Foundation Day, Id-ul-zuha, Guru Nanak Jayanti, Children’s Day, Moharram, Ramanujan’s Birthday, Christmas, New Year, Makar Sankranti, Basant Panchami and other Competitions like PPT-presentation, Inter School debate, News reading, Drawing and Painting. Our students are benefited with Yoga & Meditation, Music and Dance classes, Educational Tours, School Picnics, sports like Basket Ball, Tennis, Valley Ball, Shooting, Skating, Karate and so on. These help them to polish their co-scholastic talents, multiple intelligence and they are developed holistically.

Our school is totally a ‘Polythene Free Zone’ and we highly support an eco-friendly environment. We had a ‘Green Marathon’ recently where students distributed paper bags. School has strict discipline, tight security and best educational facilities and services for which we are ‘Best of the Best’.

For Pre-Primary and primary students, we have extreme level of ‘Play Themes and Play Items’ which makes them more talented and creative. For middle school, we mainly focus on the spoken and the presentation skills of children. For them, we use ‘Know How’ Methodology. For secondary and higher secondary students, we prepare them well for their Board examinations and many other national and international level examinations like ‘UNSW Global’s International assessments for Indian Schools’, ‘Science Olympiad Foundation’s’ competitive exams, ‘Australian Chemistry’, National Talent Search Government examination for further scholarships and many more.

Vision
At Brilliant Public School, education is looked upon as a holistic learning experience, helping each child to develop those attributes and qualities of heart and hand which will make him/her a self reliant citizen and a fine human being, socially aware and humanistic, compassionate and kind, having pride in his country and belief in the concept of universal brotherhood and peace, a person ready to work as an agency for building a more socially just and equitable society.

BELIEF AND PHILOSOPHY
We firmly believe that as an institution dedicated to the cause of education we must passionately help children to :

Recognize their true potential and shape them into confident responsible, balanced and multifaceted individuals with well groomed possibilities.
Have a sense of pride in our rich cultural heritage, ancient wisdom and value systems that will go a long way in helping them always. “think good and act good as they prepare to face the challenges of tomorrow”.
Set high ambitions in life and encourge them to passionately pursue their goal with divine devotion.
title: Brilliant Public School Bilaspur
